column6: IN THIS ISSUE: Jubilee returns to the X-Men, Gambit has trouble adjusting to life on Utopia, Northstar deals with the distance that island living necessitates and No-Girl has to save all the X-Men from a foe living right under their noses. Part 2 (of 4) Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | writer:John Barber | writer:C. B. Cebulski | penciler:Becky Cloonan | penciler:Tim Fish | colorist:Morry Hollowell | inker:Dustin Weaver
